_header: List and lithe a little space / I shall you gell a pretty case
Subjects: children, instructions for the behavior of; manners, treatises on; instruction, mother to daughter
_description: ‘þe Goode Wyfe tauȝt hyr Douȝter’, a garbled version of 1098 — 208 lines in couplets, including the introduction of four lines

BodAsh61.First Lines:
Lyst & lythe A lytell spaceI schall ȝou telle A praty
                    caceHow þe gode wyfe tauȝht hyr douȝterTo mend hyr lyfe
                    & make her better…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…And bring vs to thy hyȝhe blysseThat neuer mor fro vs
                    schall mysse
BodAsh61.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.
